Class DeleteOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.morphia.DeleteOptions

  • public final class DeleteOptions
extends Object
    The options to apply when removing documents from the DBCollection
    Since:
    1.3
    MongoDB documentation
    Remove Documents
